DOC.detailed_description: The study aim compare effect oral fructose several specific metabolic pathway male females.Participants receive isoenergetic diet contain 55 % carbohydrate , 15 % protein 35 % lipid three day prior test . After period control diet , study 2 hour post-absorptive state ( Time 0-120 min ) 6 hour period ( Time 120-480 min ) receive 4 load 0,30 g/kg fat free mass U-13C label fructose , time 120 , 180 , 240 , 300 . Throughout study , deuterated glucose glycerol infuse monitor whole body glucose production glycerol turnover . The following parameter monitor basal condition ingestion load fructose : - Glycerol turnover ( glycerol 2H5 ) - de novo lipogenesis ( incorporation 13C palmitate VLDLs ) - whole body energy expenditure net substrate oxydation ( indirect calorimetry ) - net fructose oxidation ( breath 13CO2 ) - glucose turnover : ( 6,6 2H2 Glucose ) - plasma glucose , free fatty acid , ketone body , lactate , insulin , triacylglycerol , total cholesterol , VLDL , LDL , HDL subfractions An adipose tissue ( periumbilical subcutaneous ) biopsy obtaine needle aspiration local anesthesia fast condition ( time 0 min ) fructose ( time 480 min ) ass effect fructose adipose gene expression profile . Key gene involve regulation carbohydrate ( GLUT 4 , hexokinase , PDH-kinase ) , lipid ( FAT-CD36 , FABP , acetylCoA carboxylase , malonyl-CoA decarboxylase , PPARg ) energy metabolism ( PGC-1a , UCP2 ) monitor Results obtain male female compare two-way analysis variance
